snippet: Mohamed Morsi, the former Islamist president of Egypt, heaped scorn on his opponents in the military-backed government and tried to rally his beleaguered supporters.
abstract: Mohamed Morsi, Egypt's former Islamist president, issues statement from prison heaping scorn on his opponents in military-backed government and attempting to rally his beleaguered supporters.

byline.original: By KAREEM FAHIM and MAYY EL SHEIKH

lead_paragraph: Mohamed Morsi, the former Islamist president of Egypt, heaped scorn on his opponents in the military-backed government and tried to rally his beleaguered supporters.

headline.main: In Statement From Prison, Morsi Accuses Egypt’s Military Leaders of Treason
headline.print_headline: Egypt: Morsi Accuses Military Leaders of Treason
